column4: the strangest thing happened to me... Package manager does not open, OpenOffice either, the only applications I can open is the games and Mozilla!
looks like some critical library got corrupted
run oowriter from the terminal...it will tell you the problem
what do you mean you removed it
the fact that you are still online means everything is fine :)
libstdc++ is so fundamental..you  cant work if it gets corrupted
I need libstdc++.so.5 for a game I did. That is why I copied them. But my game does not found them in Ubuntu. So, where are they?
put the special libs in a folder
put version 5 in a seperate folder...mixing libstdc++ versions is harakiri
cool, I have both version 5 and 6 of libstdc++ running, thanks for all
